name: @cloudflare-expo-ota/worker
description: OTA update server on Cloudflare Workers

BUCKET_URL.description: **(Required)** The public URL for your R2 bucket (custom domain or R2.dev subdomain). [Setup guide](https://github.com/Daniel-Griffiths/cloudflare-expo-ota-updates/blob/master/docs/SETUP_WORKER.md#configure-r2-public-access)

MAX_UPDATES_TO_KEEP.description: **(Optional)** Number of updates to keep per channel/platform/runtime. Keeps all updates by default.

ALLOWED_UPLOAD_IPS.description: **(Optional)** Comma-separated list of IPs allowed to upload updates. Leave empty to allow all. It's also **highly** recommended to setup worker [security rules](https://github.com/Daniel-Griffiths/cloudflare-expo-ota-updates/blob/master/docs/SETUP_WORKER.md#secure-the-worker).
